issue.title: Update documentation on link' frames specifying defaults and conventions

content.raw:
Excellent! I do see the improvement. Thank you!

Regarding this particular issue, there is a `<frame>` element under `<link>` and there is another `<frame>` under `<link>/<pose>` none of which show the default value. Also, some of the "Required"  are marked with a star ("*"), what does that mean?
content.html:
Excellent! I do see the improvement. Thank you!

Regarding this particular issue, there is a <frame> element under <link> and there is another <frame> under <link>/<pose> none of which show the default value. Also, some of the "Required" are marked with a star ("*"), what does that mean?
